name: event
sql:
CREATE TABLE event (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
	event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	start DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	"end" DATETIME NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT '''Scheduled''', 
	plan_notes TEXT DEFAULT '''''', 
	active BOOLEAN DEFAULT '1' NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (id)
)

name: event_objectives
sql:
CREATE TABLE event_objectives (
	event_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	objective_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (event_id, objective_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(event_id) REFERENCES event (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(objective_id) REFERENCES objective (objective_id)
)

name: event_student_status
sql:
CREATE TABLE event_student_status (
	id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	event_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(255), 
	PRIMARY KEY (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(event_id) REFERENCES event (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES student (student_id)
)

name: event_students
sql:
CREATE TABLE event_students (
	event_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (event_id, student_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(event_id) REFERENCES event (id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES student (student_id)
)

name: goal
sql:
CREATE TABLE goal (
	goal_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	goal_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	active BOOLEAN, 
	PRIMARY KEY (goal_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES student (student_id)
)

name: objective
sql:
CREATE TABLE objective (
	objective_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	goal_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	objective_description VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	with_accuracy VARCHAR(255), 
	notes TEXT, 
	active BOOLEAN, 
	PRIMARY KEY (objective_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(goal_id) REFERENCES goal (goal_id)
)

name: session
sql:
CREATE TABLE session (
	session_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	date_of_session DATE NOT NULL, 
	status VARCHAR(255), 
	time_of_session TIME NOT NULL, 
	plan_notes TEXT, 
	active BOOLEAN, 
	PRIMARY KEY (session_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES student (student_id)
)

name: session_objectives
sql:
CREATE TABLE session_objectives (
	session_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	objective_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	PRIMARY KEY (session_id, objective_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(session_id) REFERENCES session (session_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(objective_id) REFERENCES objective (objective_id)
)

name: student
sql:
CREATE TABLE student (
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
	reevaluation_date DATE, 
	annual_review_date DATE, 
	monthly_services VARCHAR(255), 
	grade VARCHAR(255), 
	preferred_name VARCHAR(255), 
	pronouns VARCHAR(50), 
	active BOOLEAN, 
	PRIMARY KEY (student_id)
)

name: trial_log
sql:
CREATE TABLE trial_log (
	trial_log_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, 
	objective_id INTEGER, 
	date_of_session DATE NOT NULL, 
	correct_no_support INTEGER, 
	correct_visual_cue INTEGER, 
	correct_verbal_cue INTEGER, 
	correct_visual_verbal_cue INTEGER, 
	correct_modeling INTEGER, 
	incorrect INTEGER, 
	notes TEXT, 
	PRIMARY KEY (trial_log_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES student (student_id), 
	FOREIGN KEY(objective_id) REFERENCES objective (objective_id)
)
